text: Augusto Arduino Claudio Rollandin1, 2, 3 and 4. (13 June 1949 â€“ 22 December 2024) was an Italian politician and veterinarian. He was born in Brusson, Italy. He was a member of the Valdostan Union. From 2001 to 2006, he was a member of the Senate. Rollandin was the president of Aosta Valley from 1984 to 1990 and again from 2008 to 2017. Rollandin died on 22 December 2024 at the age of 75.E' morto Augusto Rollandin ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2024 deaths Category:People from Aosta Valley Category:Italian politicians Category:Veterinarians
title: Augusto Rollandin
